critique: The President likely wants to convey a sense of stability and reassurance to the people of the territories. The order aims to ensure that territorial officers are present and attentive to their duties, which should inspire confidence and reduce anxiety. The President also wants to convey a sense of authority and control, demonstrating that he is taking steps to ensure the efficient administration of the territories.
